reviewText: This is a easy video to follow and the instructions are clear. The dances are all really fun. We did this at a party.

I do  not understand - I received the first part of my 2 part order - but have yet to receive the Advanced Country Line Dancing and it has been over a month!  I have referred others to this site and they have had no problem - My question is:  Are you MAD AT ME?  I teach country line dancing to seniors and I NEED this item or I would never have ordered it.

Thank you for your immediate attention to this matter and kind courtesy
Suzanne Courville
